TopicTitle: RSS with some mods keeps crashing

Articles.Content:
So after some building and tweaking on a rocket, I go in the launchpad, notice something bad, and go back in the VAB to fix it. I do that for like 3 times, but the last time it crashes, literally just closing KSP. I have a player.log file, because it helped find out the reason of crashing in the past. My mods are:

- RSS

- Ambient light adjustment

- Texture replacer

- Deadly reentry

- Engineer (doesn't seem to work)

- Environmental visual enhancements

- FAR

Player.log file:

http://download1513./iqpkzr1yf7kg/1ic0f3qn46sv99i/Player.log

I think it is me running out of memory, but I just want to double check.

I think it is me running out of memory, but I just want to double check.

You're right:

KSP(6726,0xa0bfa1d4) malloc: *** mach_vm_map(size=33554432) failed (error code=3)*** error: can't allocate region

*** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug

Receiving unhandled NULL exception

You're right:
KSP(6726,0xa0bfa1d4) malloc: *** mach_vm_map(size=33554432) failed (error code=3)*** error: can't allocate region

*** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug

Receiving unhandled NULL exception

Thanks for the reply
